          text run at (0,0) width 363: "The style declarations which apply to the text below are:"
      RenderBlock {PRE} at (0,34) size 784x64

          text run at (208,0) width 0: " "

          text run at (248,32) width 0: " "
          text run at (0,48) width 0: " "
